Blepharophimosis syndrome type 1 also causes premature ovarian failure (POF).  This condition is caused by mutations in the FOXL2 gene and is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern.",GARD,"Blepharophimosis, ptosis, and epicanthus inversus syndrome type 1"
